definitions.definition: To mingle ; to mix ; to unite intimately; to pass or shade insensibly into each other.
examples: To make hummus you need to blend chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice and garlic.

definitions.definition: To pollute by mixture or association; to spoil or corrupt ; to blot ; to stain .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To mingle ; to mix ; to unite intimately; to pass or shade insensibly into each other.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To be mingled or mixed .
( obsolete ) To pollute by mixture or association; to spoil or corrupt ; to blot ; to stain .
